branchCategory.name: Ball Screw Drive
branchCategory.description: An LEFS slider, or rodless, type electric actuator features a load mounting platform situated above a ball screw drive. A flexible seal band permits platform movement while preventing grease and foreign matter from entering the drive. Advantages include a low profile height, shorter overall length than rod types, and better positioning repeatability than belt drives.

branchItem.name: LEFS Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Ball Screw Drive
branchItem.description: The original LEFS slider features an inline motor with a cover. Because the motor drives the ballscrew directly, additional cost of a belt and pulley system is avoided. The motor cover is taller than the load platform, so be aware of potential interference at the origin position.
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Body sizes: 16, 25, 32, 40 <LI>Maximum work load: 60 kg <LI>Maximum speed: 1200 mm/s (H lead, step motor, size 25 or larger) <LI>Stroke range: 50 to 1000 mm in 50 mm increments <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.02 mm <LI>Motor types: high load step motor or high speed servo motor </LI></UL>

branchItem.name: 11-LEFS, Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Ball Screw Drive, Step Motor/Servo Motor, Clean Room
branchItem.description: The 11-LEFS is the clean room version of the standard LEFS. This version is only available with the inline motor. Strokes are available in 50mm increments only.

branchItem.name: 25A-LEFS Electric Actuator, Slider Type, Ball Screw Drive, Step Motor/ Servo Motor, Secondary Battery
branchItem.description: The 25A- series variations are compatible with secondary battery manufacturing for electronics, automotive, and other vehicle types.  Design goals include eliminating copper (Cu) and zinc (Zn) materials where possible, and employing a low dew point grease that retains lubricity even in low manufacturing termpertures.  Please note the copper and zinc materials are used for the motors, cables, controllers and drivers.
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Same features and performance as standard LEFS <LI>Stainless steel bolts for construction <LI>Low dew point grease functional down to -70°C <LI>Copper and zinc free except for motor, cables and controller <LI>Non-standard materials for compatibility with secondary/rechargeable battery manufacturing </LI></UL>
